channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: A Place in the Sun: Summer Sun
channel.desc: House hunters are taken to see properties for sale in a foreign country that they want to move to or frequently holiday in.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Finest Homes
channel.desc: Designer Edwin Murphy shares a recent project of his in the Overberg that enjoys generous proportions, while Victoria Wood shares a penthouse design in Umhlanga Durban.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Cheap Irish Homes
channel.desc: Maggie, and Kieran travel to West Cork to help single mom Steffi, who is currently renting but wants a place of her own with her 14-year-old son Cian.

channel.name: The Home Channel ZA
channel.title: Property Brothers: Forever Home
channel.desc: Brian and Kelly moved from New York to the Las Vegas suburbs for a fresh start. Drew and Jonathan transform the entire main floor and Katherine's play area.
